alert.note: Alert for Greater Vancouver Area (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 07 at 2:52PM PST until January 09 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM MONDAY TO 10 AM PST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 15 to 30 mph with gusts up to 35 to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...In Oregon, Greater Portland Metro Area and Central Willamette Valley. In Washington, Greater Vancouver Area. * WHEN...From 4 PM Monday to 10 AM PST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Wind gusts are expected to peak Monday night into early Tuesday morning with the arrival of a cold- frontal boundary.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
